data.comment: Today's referee, Nobutsugu Murakami, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 2, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Shonan throw-in in Gamba's half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shonan needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 6, Gen Shoji for Gamba drives towards goal at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Gamba have a goal kick.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Yuya Fukuda.
Great play from Patric to set up the goal.
Throw-in Shonan.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Patric (Gamba) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Gamba are coming forward and Kazuma Watanabe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Shonan are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 19, In Kanagawa Gamba attack through Shu Kurata. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Gamba's Kazuma Watanabe gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami waits before resuming play because Akimi Barada for Shonan is still down.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Gamba's area.
In the minute 27, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Gamba a goal kick.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Gamba throw-in in Shonan's half.
Akimi Barada for Shonan is back on the field again.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Gamba.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Akimi Barada for Shonan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 29, Mitsuki Saito is replacing Akimi Barada for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Kanagawa.
In the minute 32, Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
At Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka, Gen Shoji has been yellow-carded for the away team.
An attacking Shonan player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 35, Hiroto Nakagawa equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Shonan.
In the minute 39, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Shonan just outside Gamba's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
At Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka, Shonan are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 43, Gamba advance rapidly upfield but Nobutsugu Murakami blows for offside.
Free kick Shonan.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 44, Gamba's Ryu Takao has been booked in Kanagawa.
Gamba have a goal kick.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
The first-half has come to a close in Kanagawa.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Yuya Fukuda of Gamba gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 46, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Shonan a goal kick.
The home team replace Hiroto Nakagawa with Naoki Ishihara.
Gamba's Yuki Yamamoto breaks free at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Gamba at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Kanagawa.
Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 51, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Gamba's area.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 53, Gamba's Shu Kurata misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Naoki Ishihara (Shonan) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Daiki Kaneko for Shonan has been booked by Nobutsugu Murakami and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 55, In Kanagawa Gamba's Patric is caught offside.
Gamba needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Throw-in Gamba.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 60, Gamba are pushing forward but Shu Kurata's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, In Kanagawa, Shonan push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Gamba surge into the attack at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka but Kazuma Watanabeâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 65, Shonan have a goal kick.
Goal! A Patric header gives Gamba a 1-2 lead in Kanagawa.
Hiroki Fujiharu with an assist there.
In the minute 67, Shonan are pushing forward but Sosuke Shibata's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Gamba at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 69, Gamba to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Shonan make their third substitution with Satoshi Tanaka replacing Sosuke Shibata.
In the minute 70, The home team have replaced Temma Matsuda with Yuki Ohashi. This is the fourth substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Gamba.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 71, Satoshi Tanaka of Shonan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 74, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Gamba a goal kick.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Shonan's Yuki Ohashi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gamba defender.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Shonan throw-in in Gamba's half.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Shonan.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 79, Patric (Gamba) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Shonan defenders.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 82, Shota Kobayashi is replacing Kazunari Ono for the home team.
Yuki Ohashi (Shonan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 84, Kohei Okuno is on a sub for Shinya Yajima for Gamba.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a second substitution, with Shuhei Kawasaki replacing Shu Kurata.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 86, Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Shonan.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Takuya Okamoto of Shonan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Gamba's area.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
Goal kick for Gamba at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Yuya Fukuda (Gamba) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Dai Tsukamoto is on a sub for Yuya Fukuda for Gamba.
